attributes.title: Worst app

attributes.review: This app made my phone very very slow. It also took a whole week to download. I am very disappointed with this oranges app. Make America trumpless again😌💕✨☺️💞😊💗✨🧚🏼‍♀️❤️🥵💚💞😻💫

attributes.title: App Issue
attributes.review: As soon as i downloaded my phone crashed and had to restart and format my phone :(

attributes.title: Invading my rights
attributes.review: I wish I could give this app a .5 star... or even a -5! It’s horrible how it keeps intruding on my rights! UGH! Solid 1 star. Even thought this app may be tempting to download, DO NOT FALL FOR IT!

attributes.title: DINT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: I wanted to support him but they stole information so I had to delete it worse app ever I guess they need to delete it and make it with a different company sooooo disappointing.

attributes.title: Make America Hate Again
attributes.review:
This app is useless. It glitches out and has a horrible construction.
Our founding fathers are probably rolling in their graves right now.

attributes.title: Feels racist
attributes.review: This made me feel immediately racists as soon as I downloaded it. I immediately sent 100$ to advocate for protestors thrown in jail without reason. Thanks for the reflection

attributes.title: Apple DELETE THIS APP ITS TRASHHHHH
attributes.review: Honestly this app  is terrible for iPhones all of a sudden my phone has stared glitching and over heating and I have the iPhone 11!!!! APPLE INC. please remove this trash from the App Store !!! It’s nothing but false advertisement.
